title: Run scripts or one-liner scripts before or after things occur

backup:before.title: Run the script when the backup is going to be done

backup:after.title: Run the script when the backup is done, but before uploading it

backup:error.title: Run the script when the backup has failed for some reason

backup:tasks:before.title: Run the script when the backup tasks definition is going to be run

backup:tasks:after.title: Run the script when the backup tasks definition has been run

backup:tasks:error.title: Run the script when the backup tasks definition run has failed for some reason

backup:tasks:task:before.title: Run the script when the backup task is going to be run

backup:tasks:task:after.title: Run the script when the backup task has been run

backup:tasks:task:error.title: Run the script when the backup task run has failed for some reason

upload:before.title: Run the script when the backup is going to be uploaded using one provider

upload:after.title: Run the script when the backup have been uploaded using one provider

upload:error.title: Run the script when the backup could not be uploaded using one provider

oldBackup:deleting.title: Run the script when an old backup is going to be deleted

oldBackup:deleted.title: Run the script when an old backup is already deleted

oldBackup:error.title: Run the script when an old backup failed when it was being deleted
